Subject: Re: Situations.
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

The main computer consol in the Maximal base opened up, revealing the
camera footage of Condor in the cell, struggling on the ground. As it
zoomed in on the damaged Maximal, a hoarse voice greeted her. "Greeting
Iron Raptor, it is so nice to finally have met you". The picture on the
screen changes from Condor's cell, to a heavily equiped room, with
Megatron, standing tall and strong, with his arms crossed, as the main
thing in the room, looking straight at Iron Raptor. Scourge and Cyclonus
were around him. Megatron had a wicked looking smile.
